columns.name: group_name
columns.description: The friendly name that identifies the security group.

columns.name: group_id
columns.description: Contains the unique ID to identify a security group.

columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) specifying the security group.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description of the security group.

columns.name: vpc_id
columns.description: The ID of the VPC for the security group.

columns.name: owner_id
columns.description: Contains the AWS account ID of the owner of the security group.

columns.name: ip_permissions
columns.description: A list of inbound rules associated with the security group

columns.name: ip_permissions_egress
columns.description: A list of outbound rules associated with the security group

columns.name: tags_src
columns.description: A list of tags that are attached to the security group
